mapper.select: select tb_document.document_id, tb_document.title, tb_document.description, tb_document.last_edit_time, tb_document.first_picture, tb_type.type_id, tb_type.type_name, tb_user.user_id, tb_user.nickname, tb_user.image from tb_document, tb_user, tb_type where tb_document.user_id=tb_user.user_id and tb_type.type_id = tb_document.type_id and tb_document.published=1 order by tb_document.last_edit_time limit #{documentIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_document where published =1

SELECT tb_type.type_id,count(*) count,tb_type.type_name from tb_document doc ,tb_type where doc.type_id = tb_type.type_id and doc.published=1 GROUP BY tb_type.type_id ORDER BY count desc limit 0,#{value }

SELECT count(*) count,tb_tag.tag_id,tb_tag.tag_name from tb_document doc ,tb_document_tag doctag ,tb_tag where doc.document_id = doctag.document_id and doctag.tag_id = tb_tag.tag_id and doc.published =1 GROUP BY doctag.tag_id ORDER BY count desc limit 0,#{value }
select document_id,title from tb_document where recommend=1 and published=1 order by last_edit_time desc limit 0,#{value }

select tb_document.document_id, tb_document.title, tb_document.description, tb_document.last_edit_time, tb_document.first_picture, tb_type.type_id, tb_type.type_name, tb_user.user_id, tb_user.nickname, tb_user.image from tb_document, tb_user, tb_type where tb_document.user_id=tb_user.user_id and tb_type.type_id = tb_document.type_id and (tb_document.title like '%${query}%' or tb_document.content like '%${query}%') and tb_document.published=1 order by tb_document.last_edit_time limit #{documentIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_document where published=1 and (title like '%${query}%' or content like '%${query}%')
SELECT tb_type.type_id,count(*) count,tb_type.type_name from tb_document doc ,tb_type where doc.type_id = tb_type.type_id and doc.published=1 GROUP BY tb_type.type_id ORDER BY count desc

SELECT tb_tag.tag_id,count(*) count,tb_tag.tag_name from tb_document doc ,tb_tag,tb_document_tag where doc.document_id = tb_document_tag.document_id and tb_document_tag.tag_id = tb_tag.tag_id and doc.published=1 GROUP BY tb_tag.tag_id ORDER BY count desc
